alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Macon; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Elmore, western Macon and south central Tallapoosa Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Santuck to near Victoryland to near Hardaway. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tuskegee, Tallassee, Milstead, Shorter, Franklin, Liverpool, Reeves Airport, Tallapoosa City, Tysonville, Victoryland, Claud, Yates Dam, Cross Keys and Yates Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
